description:
Bo City`s Mu shi family eldest, born with ice magic and has extraordinary qualifications. Mu Zhao Yun`s daughter, a rare genius ice magician. At 15 years old was admitted to the empire magical university . Majoring in ice. She is Mo Fan`s childhood sweetheart.
Like Mo Fan, she is also one of the World`s Top 100 Listed Naturally Talented individuals, she is in possession of the Natural Born Spirit Element.
Her talent makes her Ice Element incredibly powerful giving her a natural 2 times and more increase in power and potency in all Ice magic she uses. It was later revealed that this talent increases in potency boost as her cultivation level increases and can further evolves Ice Spirit Element into Soul Element.
name: Mu Ning Xue
